Sentencas: In this article, a process for sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming in an adiabatic fixed-bed reactor coupled with a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is evaluated using a 1D numerical reactor model combined with a simplified fuel cell simulation.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: A novel material comprising CaO/CuO/Al2O3(NiO) pellets is considered.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: Three operating stages are considered in the proposed system, namely (i) CaO carbonation/reforming, (ii) Cu and Ni oxidation, and (iii) CaCO3 calcination/CuO and NiO reduction.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: The operating conditions that enable cyclic operation of these stages and the strategy needed to switch between each stage are evaluated.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: Under the adopted control strategy, methane conversion was about 95%, whilst H-2 yield and purity were around 3.2 mol(H2)mol(CH4)(-1) and 90%, respectively.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: Moreover, a concentrated CO2 stream ready for storage was obtained.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: By using a portion of the produced H-2 to make the process self-sufficient from an energy standpoint, an equivalent H-2 yield and a reforming efficiency of about 2.8 mol(H2)mol(CH4)(-1) and 84% were achieved, respectively.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: With respect to SOFC integration, net power and thermal energy generation of around 11 kW and 6 kW, respectively, can be achieved.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: With respect to the chemical energy of the inlet methane, the net electrical and thermal efficiencies of the considered process are 56% and 30%, respectively, ie., the overall efficiency of the entire system is 86%.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: The proposed cogeneration system showed better thermodynamic, environmental and economic performances than those of conventional systems, with an investment pay-back period of 2.2 years in the worst-case scenario.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system

Sentencas: The levelised cost of electricity, of heat and total power were about 0.096 (sic) kW h(-1), 0.19 (sic) kW h(-1), and 0.065 (sic) kW h(-1), respectively, while the CO2 emissions were avoided at no cost.
Titulo: Feasibility of CaO/CuO/NiO sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming integrated with solid-oxide fuel cell for near-zero-CO2 emissions cogeneration system
